description: This file defines the interface for system resource monitoring, providing function declarations for creating, destroying, configuring, printing, retrieving, and resetting system resource information. It serves as a header for implementing system resource monitoring features in a C/C++ project.

methods.name: createSysResourceMonitor
methods.description: Initializes and creates a system resource monitor instance.

methods.name: destroySysResourceMonitor
methods.description: Destroys and deallocates the system resource monitor instance.

methods.name: setSysResourceMonitorPollingPeriod
methods.description: Sets the polling period for system resource monitoring in seconds.

methods.name: printSysResourceInfo
methods.description: Prints current system resource information to standard output or logs.

methods.name: getSysResourceInfo
methods.description: Retrieves a string containing the current system resource information, optionally including iteration delta data.

methods.name: resetIterDelta
methods.description: Resets the iteration delta counters used in system resource statistics.
